trans-unit.source: Represents a wrapper class for a file handle.
trans-unit.target: 代表檔案控制代碼的包裝函式類別。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 or -1 is an invalid file handle.
trans-unit.target: 值為 0 或-1 是無效的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> object that represents the pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>物件，代表要使用預先存在的控制代碼。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to reliably release the handle during the finalization phase; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to prevent reliable release (not recommended).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要可靠地釋放控制代碼在結束階段。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>防止釋放 （不建議）。
